mapper.sql: id, mainid, bank, account, address, province, city, property_bank_id, is_default, bank_type, boss_id, update_flag
mapper.select: SELECT uvd1.id,uv.boss_id AS bossmainid,uvd1.account,uvd1.accountname,uvd1.bank,uv.modedatacreater,hr.lastname AS createBy,hr.lastname AS updateBy FROM uf_vendor_dt1 uvd1 LEFT JOIN uf_vendor uv ON uvd1.mainid = uv.id LEFT JOIN HrmResource hr ON uv.modedatacreater = hr.id WHERE (uvd1.account !='无' OR uvd1.account IS NOT NULL) AND uv.boss_id IS NOT NULL AND (uvd1.update_flag IS NULL OR uvd1.update_flag = 0 OR uvd1.update_flag = '') AND uvd1.is_default = 1

SELECT uvd1.id,uvd1.bank_type,uv.boss_id AS bossmainid,uvd1.account,uvd1.accountname,uvd1.bank,uv.modedatacreater,hr.lastname AS createBy,hr.lastname AS updateBy FROM uf_vendor_dt1 uvd1 LEFT JOIN uf_vendor uv ON uvd1.mainid = uv.id LEFT JOIN HrmResource hr ON uv.modedatacreater = hr.id WHERE (uvd1.account !='无' OR uvd1.account IS NOT NULL) AND uv.boss_id IS NOT NULL AND uvd1.update_flag = 1 AND uvd1.boss_id IS NOT NULL AND uvd1.is_default = 1
mapper.update:
UPDATE uf_vendor_dt1
update_flag = #{updateFlag},
boss_id = #{bossId},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert:

update uf_vendor_dt1
mainid = #{mainid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
property_bank_id = #{propertyBankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bank_type = #{bankType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
boss_id = #{bossId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_flag = #{updateFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update uf_vendor_dt1 set mainid = #{mainid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, property_bank_id = #{propertyBankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank_type = #{bankType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, boss_id = #{bossId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_flag = #{updateFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
